room_title: Escape room "The Doctor Jones Study Heist" by EscapeTech in Salem
review: We did Dr. Jones study heist and had lots of fun. A couple of our "tools" were working intermittently, but all in all, we had a great time. Looking forward to trying a harder room next time when my grandchild is not in tow.
